tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Hi, I came to know about Dr. RADHIKA madam & Diya Fertility Clinic thru practo while I was searching for good gynecologist. I read so many reviews and finally took appointment and visited clinic. Me and my husband were confident and satisfied about Dr. Radhika mam on the first day of our visit because, madam has first listened our problem carefully and checked very orderly and in every visit she explains what and how she'll proceed next. 
Madam will never be in hurry no matter how many patients are there. She checks properly every patient. 
We are really thankful to madam the way she listens, treats everyone with cool mind and respect. Builds confidence and removes all doubts and worries. We have seen positive results with madam treatment.

If you're planning for kids and facing any problem please do visit Dr.Radhika S Bhandary madam in Diya Fertility clinic.

Coming to Staff members they are very good, friendly, polite, alert, decent behavior with patients and works with Unity. Explains everything clearly about medicine's. Thank you staff.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: i have already given a review for DR Radhika earlier during my PCOS treatment before an year.After the treatment i conceived and delivered a baby boy..its been 9months since i delivered and writing this review again so that it would be helpful for couples who is worried about those taunts from relatives,parents and even  neighbors for not having children.Please do visit doctors like Radhika ma'am who will not just end up concluding with only the  symptoms and will always go step by step with the treatment process. i will recommend her to anyone who approaches me for a suggestion.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ******* *** ** *** ** *** ****** ******* * **** ***** visited for pcos problem today and was really surprised with the way of treatment she suggested! She has explained me the underlying cause and immediately suggested me with the appropriate medication. I was facing this problem since many years and no one suggested me for the root cause which radhika mam did in my first visit. M really thankful to radhika mam..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: While I have only visited the doctor twice now, what has stood out so far is the explanation of the health issue and treatment by the doctor. I feel very comfortable with the approach so far. I will update this review later again based on result of the treatment. So far am very happy and confident about the treatment and doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: First of all she was recommended by one of the most experienced Gynecologist, this itself shows the good reputation for Dr. Radhika Mam. After few visits itself we gain good confidence on her, in the way she is explaining about the treatment and the possible outcomes clearly. She is also good in listening to us and able to answer our queries. I would recommend this doctor since we are now blessed with the Baby girl after just an year of  treatment followup with Dr. Radhika Mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Pregnancy with PCOD,
review: I'm a 33 year old female with hypothyroidism and PCOS, was married for 6 years and couldn't conceive. We visited radhika madam for fertility treatment. Madam has been very friendly and supportive throughout the treatment. She explained every detail clearly and patiently during each treatment cycle for both me and my husband and helped us plan our pregnancy safely. I'm blessed with a baby girl after 5 cycles of treatment and IUI performed by Radhika madam. Madam has been quite reliable and fulfilled our dream of becoming parents, despite me having hypothyroid and PCOS condition. Both me and my husband are quite thankful to madam for our happiness.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I not from sainikpuri area but in an emergency I was searching for a gynaecologist but no one was available in the evening hrs due to corona virus. But she took my appointment. I was really tensed because in the morning the radiologist told me few things thats scary. But when I went to her she calmed me down. Again did a scan told me thing are fine gave me future medicine as I won't be able to visit her again, she guided me for further treatment at my home town. Very friendly. Wrote me a permission latter for my travel. The staff is very very friendly so the doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.RADHIKA Mam so sweet and friendly nature.nd staff was so good I'm so satisfied with this hospital Nd MAM ,Nd staff ,thank you diya fertility clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is really Friendly The Best Doctor she understood what we explain and give the best treatment I really suggest this doctor to all Women's.. and staff is also good..only thing is its long to visit hospital.

review: She is so friendly, supportive and open minded.  She explains the condition with patience. We are much satisfied with the treatment provided. We are much thankful to her for the care taken. We strongly recommend to visit her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The doctor and nursing staff is super friendly. It was very pleasurable  to meet such friendly people. 
The doctor was super cool such that she takes more time for each patient explains each and every problem. 
I will definitely recommend this doctor for people in need. üòçüòç

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I underwent the fertility treatment with Dr Radhika last year. In past I had two ectopic pregnancies and thus had to undergo ivf. Her patience, resilience to fill happiness in patients like me is adorable. I am 33 weeks now and cant wait see my baby soon just because of Dr radhika.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Visited Radhika Ma'am after reading few reviews in Practo as we were new to Hyderabad and had no one to guide us through my PCOS treatment. It was one of the best decision made and  Ma'am did all the tests step by step which resulted positively. Within 4months i concieved. Thanks to Radhika Ma'am and i sincerely recommend her for inferrility treatment due any hormonal issues. Consulting her for the pregnancy now.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
